metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12467 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki through 1.32.1 has Incorrect Access Control (issue 1 of 3). A spammer can use Special:ChangeEmail to send out spam with no rate limiting or ability to block them. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and 1.27.6.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12467` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
